pages.text: Many abilities only trigger or care about a specific type of buddy. This uses item tags so expansion mods can add to the groupings. This section acts as a guide for each type of grouping.

pages.title: Animal
pages.text: Animal buddies is a grouping for mob based buddies that depict animals.

pages.title: Monster
pages.text: Monster buddies is a grouping for mob based buddies that depict hostile monsters.

pages.title: Food
pages.text: Food buddies is a grouping for item or block based buddies that depict a food.

pages.title: Redstone
pages.text: Redstone buddies is a grouping for buddies that specifically care about being powered or powering other buddies, often related specifically to redstone.

pages.title: Metal
pages.text: Metal buddies is a more abstract grouping for buddies that are metallic, normally ingots.

pages.title: Enchantable
pages.text: Enchantable buddies is a more abstract grouping often used for materials that make tools or tools themselves.

pages.title: Fire
pages.text: Fire buddies is a more niche grouping often used for buddies depicting fire or something fire-like.

pages.title: Fungal
pages.text: Fungal buddies is a more niche grouping often used for mushroom or fungal based buddies.
